name: Isaac Newton
contribution: Laws of motion and universal gravitation
quote: If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of giants.

name: Albert Einstein
quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

name: James Clerk Maxwell
quote: Thoroughly conscious ignorance is the prelude to every real advance in science.

name: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

name: Galileo Galilei
quote: And yet it moves.

name: Niels Bohr
quote: Prediction is very difficult, especially about the future.

name: Richard Feynman
quote: I would rather have questions that can't be answered than answers that can't be questioned.

name: Stephen Hawking
quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change.

name: Erwin Schrödinger
quote: The task is not so much to see what no one has yet seen, but to think what nobody has yet thought.

name: Werner Heisenberg
quote: Not only is the Universe stranger than we think, it is stranger than we can think.

name: Dmitri Mendeleev
quote: There is nothing in this world that I fear to say.

name: Antoine Lavoisier
quote: Nothing is lost, nothing is created, everything is transformed.

name: Linus Pauling
quote: The best way to have a good idea is to have lots of ideas.

name: Gilbert N. Lewis
quote: Every experiment proves something. If it doesn't prove what you wanted it to, it proves something else.

name: Robert Boyle
quote: The excellency of a subject doth not always lie in the difficulty of its principles.

name: Rosalind Franklin
quote: Science and everyday life cannot and should not be separated.

name: Ahmed Zewail
quote: The real wealth of a nation is its people.

name: Jöns Jacob Berzelius
quote: Theories are like searchlights; they do not illuminate the whole landscape, but direct the way.

name: Glenn T. Seaborg
quote: The education of young people in science is at least as important, maybe more so, than the research itself.

name: Marie Curie
quote: Be less curious about people and more curious about ideas.

name: Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz
contribution: Co-creator of calculus and differential notation
quote: The present is big with the future.

name: Joseph-Louis Lagrange
quote: As long as algebra and geometry proceed in separate paths, their progress is slow and their applications limited.

name: Leonhard Euler
quote: Mathematicians are like lovers... grant them their first request and they will follow you anywhere.

name: Augustin-Louis Cauchy
quote: It is by logic we prove, it is by intuition we discover.

name: Bernhard Riemann
quote: If only I had the theorems! Then I should find the proofs easily enough.

name: Brook Taylor
quote: The study of mathematics is like playing a musical instrument.

name: Colin Maclaurin
quote: Mathematics may be compared to a mill, which grinds your input and gives you truth.

name: Émilie du Châtelet
contribution: Translated Newton’s Principia and explained his calculus
quote: I am convinced that many women are either ignorant or made so because men are unwilling to share knowledge.

name: Joseph Fourier
quote: Mathematics compares the most diverse phenomena and discovers the secret analogies that unite them.

name: Charles Darwin
contribution: Theory of evolution by natural selection
quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, but the most adaptable.

name: Gregor Mendel
contribution: Father of genetics through pea plant experiments
quote: My scientific studies have afforded me great gratification.

name: Louis Pasteur
quote: Chance favors only the prepared mind.

name: Barbara McClintock
quote: If you know you are on the right track, if you have this inner knowledge, then nobody can turn you off.

name: Alexander Fleming
quote: One sometimes finds what one is not looking for.

name: Rachel Carson
contribution: Pioneer of environmental science, author of Silent Spring
quote: The more clearly we can focus our attention on the wonders of the universe, the less taste we shall have for destruction.

name: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

name: Edward O. Wilson
contribution: Father of sociobiology and biodiversity advocate
quote: Destroying rainforest for economic gain is like burning a Renaissance painting to cook a meal.

name: Lynn Margulis
quote: Life did not take over the globe by combat, but by networking.
